post.title: Zero to TypeScript in ... I'll let you know when it's done.
post.description: So I've been disliking Javascript for a while now, I won't lie - but I understand necessity.  Looks like it's time to give Typescript a go and try to make the best of it.  Enjoy my suffering.
post.excerpt: I know what you're thinking... Well let me tell you, I've never been the biggest fan of JavaScript! If you're still reading, let me explain…
